column4: hey guys, can someone give me a hand ripping an ISO of a CD? I have tried dd if=/media/cdrom1 of=my_cd.iso but it is saying that /media/cdrom1 is a directory
I thought about that too... I was trying to get the dd method to work. Thanks for all the help though! it's always nice to get more help than I know what to do with
I know the guy who makes dosbox :P
agreed. I need to get .63 for iso loading unfortunately
yeah, I am gonna man apt-get a minute to see if it is worth the effort...
if you're paranoid or very clumsy, you could fetch the file in question through ftp, and use dpkg -i
nah, like I siad... not a huge deal if I frag this system, just want to know what I am getting into :)
do you happen to have the link to that wiki entry handy?
I only have deb-src hoary universe
I already have those I think, since I had dosbox installed once
